item.title: In the Battle for Next Pope, Cardinal Erdö Emerges as a Conservative Favorite
item.description: The archbishop is a standard-bearer for those in the church who favor a return to traditional rules and doctrine after Pope Francis.

item.title: Cable Theft in Spain Disrupts Train Travel for Thousands, Officials Say
item.description: Oscar Puente, the transport minister, said “a serious act of sabotage” had brought some service to a halt, delaying service into Monday.
